michjamanaya nam:- pawitu wu mas marim aadi diwiwatup nisa karana karmanthayekin ho dal kemen karap kadu dunu thanim aadi wu shilpayekin ho paropaghathaya pinisa pawathna manthra shasthradi yam kisi widyayekin ho bharatha yuddha shithaharanadin pilibanda asu piru than athi bawekin ho noyek durbhashithayen yuktha wu kawya natakadin pilibanda prathibhanayekin (wuwamana kotasak kenehi waha watahena huru buhuti danimekin) ho ajashila ajawrathadi mithyashila wrathayekin ho yam kisi mithyadrushtiyekin ho wenath mebandu yam thama pilibanda lamaka deyekin ho udangu wa ‘me me deyin mam usasmi’ sithaganna abhimanaya yi.

ema rajanduwa 1932 di bicha watimen pasuwa bihiwu aanduwa samaga etharam ayihodayiyak nathi deshapalanayen thora pudgalayeku lesa thama rajakariya karagena giya athara ohu ha aanduwa athara prathama gatuma nirmanaya wune ewakata ohu pradhaniya lesa sewaya kala, kadet niladharin puhunu kala hamuda akadamiya, aanduwe yuda amathyawaraya wisin wasa damu pasuwa wana athara inpasuwa karyabharayak nomathi janaralwarayeku bawata pathwanawa pamanak nowa aanduwe wiparamatada lakwu ayeku bawata pathwu pasuwayi.
